title: Vintage Scripty fonts
content:
Hi I am needing help identifying these fonts. Most importantly the top 2. Any help would be greatly appreciated, and the Script font is AWESOME!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012022736im_/http:/typophile.com/files/whatthefont_6022.png)
author: chihuahualawyer

comments.content: Yes! Thanks! Anyone know the others?

HAND MADE: [Weston](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012022736/http:/fontfabric.com/weston-free-font)  
GUARANTEED: hard to say, may be [Alternate Gothic No.1](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012022736/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/alternate-gothic)...
